title: Losing Hextech  Crafting Items
body: Hey Riot, I had a decent amount of material saved up, enough to make a project lucian skin shard or getting the summoner icons and loading screens for the newer project skins. They're all gone now. Did I miss an announcement about losing these or are they coming back? I also had some other crafting materials that I was holding on to.

replies.body:
PROJECT:Disruption and Worlds 2016 loot is being removed as mentioned in our [Worlds 2016 announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift):

> "Crafting materials will expire at 23:59 PST on November 6 along with the team emotes, recalls, and leftover PROJECT crafting materials as well."

I hope this clears up the confusion. Let me know if you have any questions.

Hellow summoner! I couldnt find the red post about this but i know it was something along the lines of:

You will keep all the content you have except for the Championship Jewels/project crafting materials/etc . 

What will reset is the whole one chest per champion per season thing. Once the new season starts, you will be able to earn another chest on champions with whom you have already
